amendment.description: Amendment requires country of origin labeling of perishable agricultural commodities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section requiring country of origin lableling of perishable agricultural commodities.

action.text: Amendment (A033) offered by Mrs. Mary Bono.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bono amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 296 - 121 (Roll no. 370).
